# AVPlayer.ActionAtItemEnd.advance

**Case**

The player should advance to the next item, if there is one.

## Declaration

```swift
case advance
```

## Actions

- **AVPlayer.ActionAtItemEnd.pause**: The player should pause playing.
- **AVPlayer.ActionAtItemEnd.none**: The player should do nothing.
title: AVPlayer.ActionAtItemEnd.advance
